query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPST0203 SET BIGO = CAST(#BIGO# AS VARCHAR(600) ) ,EDATE = SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8) ,ETIME = SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),9,6) ,AENAM = #G_USER_ID# ,KETF1_DATE = DECODE(VALUE(#KETF1_DATE#,HEX(CURRENT DATE)),'00000000',HEX(CURRENT DATE),#KETF1_DATE#) ,KETF2_DATE = #KETF2_DATE# ,KETF3_DATE = #KETF3_DATE# ,RECEPTIONIST = 'È­¹°Çü'
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSPID = #PSPID# AND POSID = #POSID# AND CHK_KIND = #CHK_KIND# AND CHASU = #CHASU#
